title: How to build a simple and good house in 1200 sq ft with a 15-18 lakh budget - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes of-course you can build a simple and elegant good looking house in 1200 sq.ft. with the specififed budget. The only thing through which you can achieve this is by using latest technologies in the construction industry. There are many latest technologies available in the market so consult with a proper consultant or a builder so that you get a clear idea about the construction.
